text.text: Constantan is the first Harvest Tier that you'll need to use alloys. You'll need the Smeltery described in the Mighty Smelting book.

· Plated Slimewood
· Constantan (Copper + Nickel)
· Rose Gold (3 Copper + Gold)
· Pig Iron (Iron + Blood + Clay)
· Nahuatl
· Slimesteel (Iron + Skyslime + Seared Brick)
· Uranium
· Blood Bone
· Emerald Upgrade
